name: interleave
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to put layers or flat pieces of something between layers or flat pieces of something else
trans_examp.trans_cn: （在书页或扁平的物体间）插入

example.eg: They interleaved the pages with absorbent paper to dry them out.
example.egtrans: 他们在书页之间用吸水纸隔开，以便把书页弄干。

trans_examp.trans_en: to combine different things so that parts of one thing are put between parts of another thing

example.eg: The film interleaves extracts from her father's autobiography with family interviews.
example.egtrans: 这部电影将她父亲的自传片段与家庭访谈交织在一起。
